question: What is the best mortgage option for me with an income of $80,000 and excellent credit?
true_answer: With an income of $80,000 and excellent credit, a 30-year fixed mortgage is recommended, offering stability.

steps.content: What is the best mortgage option for me with an income of $80,000 and excellent credit?

Plan: 1) Hand off to home_loan_agent for mortgage options. 2) Consult credit_agent for credit evaluation. 3) Use calculator for affordability analysis. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Provide final recommendation.
Retrieving mortgage options suited for high income and excellent credit.
Options include 30-year fixed, 15-year fixed, or ARM. 30-year fixed offers stability.
Excellent credit score qualifies for best rates and terms.
Calculating affordability based on $80,000 income and mortgage options.
With $80,000 income, all options are affordable, but 30-year fixed offers lower monthly payments.
Can I pay off early without penalties?
Checking for early payoff penalties for common mortgage types.
Most fixed-rate mortgages allow early payoff without penalties.
Providing final recommendation based on gathered information.
With an income of $80,000 and excellent credit, a 30-year fixed mortgage is recommended, offering stability and no early payoff penalties.
